name: ch2pla
author: Evan <github@erosson.org>

scripts.//dev: All this `bash -xc '... && true '` boilerplate makes things work on windows, with git-for-windows bash installed. I'm not a real windows dev, sorry - happy to take nicer pull requests here
scripts.copyDeps: bash -xc 'mkdir -p assets/lib && cp node_modules/amf-js/src/amf.js assets/lib && cp node_modules/zlibjs/bin/rawinflate.min.js assets/lib && true '
scripts.dev: bash -xc 'yarn copyDeps && cp CHANGELOG.md ./assets && elm-live src/Main.elm --open --dir=assets -- --output assets/elm.js && true'
scripts.build: bash -xc 'rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn copyDeps && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp -rp assets/* dist/ && elm-make src/Main.elm --output dist/elm.js && true'
scripts.//test: you probably want to run this with --watch, like 'yarn test --watch'
scripts.format: bash -xc 'elm-format --yes src && prettier --write assets/ports.js assets/stats.json && true '
scripts.lint: bash -xc 'elm-format --validate src && prettier --list-different assets/ports.js assets/stats.json && true '

//optionalDependencies: because travis fails to install me, but doesn't actually need me
